}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "WN6503AH V02 323C1623228D" is silkscreened on the board. {{See also|Lite-On WN6503AH (Samsung)|Lite-On WN6503A}} *OEM: [[Lite-On]] WN6503AH V02 :P/N: 323C1623228D :2x2:2 MIMO
This device uses the [[Atheros AR5BHB116]] reference design. :The OUI is from a module labeled as an WPEA-121N/W.
[[Category:English Documentation]]
